column6: "BLOCKBUSTER" Finale! The secret of Wolverine's would-be assassins is revealed. The confrontation is more than you can imagine. Also, Jean Grey's powers seem out of control. What's up with that? 32 PGS./ALL AGES ...$2.25
column8: | writer:Brian Michael Bendis | penciller (cover):David Finch | inker:Art Thibert
